about_the_game:
Welcome to a terrifying horror game that will test your nerves and challenge your survival instincts.

In this game, you will face your deepest, darkest fears as you explore a series of locations: The Catacombs, The High Tech Prison and many other locations with future updates as you try to escape the clutches of the demon.

With advanced UI and stunning visuals currently being ported to Unreal Engine 5.4, every detail of the game is designed to immerse you in the horror and keep you on the edge of your seat. As you navigate the Catacombs, you'll encounter puzzles, traps, and terrifying creatures that will test your wits and your courage. Can you survive the night and escape Beelzebub's grasp? Only time will tell. Get ready to face your fears.
detailed_description:
Welcome to a terrifying horror game that will test your nerves and challenge your survival instincts.

In this game, you will face your deepest, darkest fears as you explore a series of locations: The Catacombs, The High Tech Prison and many other locations with future updates as you try to escape the clutches of the demon.

With advanced UI and stunning visuals currently being ported to Unreal Engine 5.4, every detail of the game is designed to immerse you in the horror and keep you on the edge of your seat. As you navigate the Catacombs, you'll encounter puzzles, traps, and terrifying creatures that will test your wits and your courage. Can you survive the night and escape Beelzebub's grasp? Only time will tell. Get ready to face your fears.

name: FearBound

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 64 bit
  • Processor: i3 - 8130U / Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: These are the minimum specs for, 720P at 50% resolution.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 64 bit
  • Processor: i3 9100F / Ryzen 3 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1050TI / RX560
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: These are the minimum specs for, 1080P at 100% resolution / 60FPS
